name: Sopwith VR
detailed_description:
World War One flight combat simulator inspired by David L. Clark's classic game from 1984. Dogfight and shoot down Fokker triplanes with your Sopwith biplane. This is an early build so things are still incomplete and broken and it's only been tested on Vive.

Grab the throttle or yoke with Grip buttons.
Fire with the Trigger button.

RIFT: Blip with B Button, Rudder with Joystick.
VIVE: Blip with Menu Button, Rudder with Touchpad.
WMR: Blip with Trackpad click, Rudder with Joystick.

Press both Blip buttons to center cockpit view.

short_description: Minimalist World War One flight combat simulator inspired by David L. Clark's classic game from 1984. Dogfight and shoot down triplanes with touch controls, airfoil physics, destructible environments, and AI pilots.
